price: 71. Alobi: Bozua bana ba ngai ya basi soki bolingi bosala bango oyo bolingi.
arabic: قَالَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ بَنَاتِيٓ إِن كُنتُمۡ فَٰعِلِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qāla hāulāi banātī in kuntum fāʿilīna
